jd: From: Aakash, Ozin Technologies aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Reply to: aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Position: Full Stack .Net Technical Product ManagerLocation: Seattle, WA 98191 - HybridLength: 9 months contractInterview: Video (They can ask you to come on-site for In-person interview, that is possibility as well)Visa Status: Any Visa (No H1 & OPT/CPT) Must Haves:Bachelor's Degree and 5 years experience as a Full Stack .Net Product managerMicrosoft Power Business Intelligence (BI) (P3 - Advanced)Project Management Office (PMO) (P3 - Advanced)Supply Chain Management (SCM) (P3 - Advanced) Overview:Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Responsibilities:Developing a business process definition repository and implementing Business Activity Monitoring (BAM) for Supply Chain (SC) business operations.Utilizing process mining for process optimization and providing a real-time transactional view across systems for Critical Service Operations (CSOs).Improving monitoring capabilities, including Quality of Service (QoS) and BAM. ??Creating structure through system definition and information architecture to support product usability.Crafting terminology, product and feature naming, and conducting research to optimize product experience and interface ??Influencing design to ensure the finished product meets user requirements and needs.Collaborating to develop system guidelines and design features.Developing and implementing communication
